intro.title: Werde Teil von Lemon-Time
intro.description: Wir sind ein interdisziplinäres Team aus Strateg:innen, Kreativen, Media-Expert:innen und Community-Spezialist:innen. Gemeinsam entwickeln wir Kampagnen, die kulturelle Vielfalt sichtbar machen. Du möchtest mit uns Zukunft gestalten? Dann freuen wir uns auf dich.

values.title: Kulturelle Diversität
values.description: Unser Team spiegelt die Communities wider, die wir ansprechen. Wir lernen voneinander und wachsen zusammen.

values.title: Mut & Ownership
values.description: Wir geben Raum für Ideen, experimentieren gern und tragen Verantwortung für unsere Projekte.

values.title: Weiterentwicklung
values.description: Gezielte Trainings, Mentoring und individuelle Learning Budgets sind bei uns selbstverständlich.

benefits.title: Hybrides Arbeiten
benefits.description: Remote-Option + Studio in Frankfurt am Main mit Content- und Podcast-Space.

benefits.title: Community-Tage
benefits.description: Zusätzliche freie Tage zu religiösen Feiertagen (z. B. Bayram).

benefits.title: Weiterbildung
benefits.description: Jährliches Budget für Konferenzen, Sprachkurse und Fachtrainings.

openings.title: Senior Strategist Ethnomarketing (w/m/d)
openings.description: Du entwickelst kanalübergreifende Strategien, führst Workshops mit Kund:innen und bist Sparringspartner:in für Kreation und Media.
responsibilities: Entwicklung von Insights und Opportunity Maps
Enge Zusammenarbeit mit Creative und Media Team
requirements: Sicherer Umgang mit Marktforschung und Analytics

openings.title: Content Producer Social & Video (w/m/d)
openings.description: Du planst und produzierst crossmediale Content-Formate – von Reels über Interviews bis Podcast.
requirements: Erfahrung mit Adobe CC / DaVinci Resolve
Verständnis für TikTok-, Instagram- und YouTube-Mechaniken

emptyState.title: Aktuell keine passende Stelle dabei?
emptyState.description: Wir wachsen kontinuierlich und freuen uns über Initiativbewerbungen. Erzähl uns, wie du Lemon-Time verstärken möchtest.

intro.title: Lemon-Time ekibine katıl
intro.description: Strateji, kreatif, medya ve topluluk yönetiminden oluşan disiplinlerarası bir ekibiz. Kültürel çeşitliliği iletişimle buluşturmak istiyoruz. Sen de bu yolculuğun parçası olmak istersen başvurunu bekliyoruz.

values.title: Çeşitlilik
values.description: Topluluklarımızı yansıtan bir ekip kurduk; birbirimizden öğreniyoruz.

values.title: Sorumluluk
values.description: Projelere sahip çıkar, fikirlerimizi cesurca paylaşırız.

values.title: Gelişim
values.description: Mentorluk programları ve kişisel eğitim bütçeleriyle büyümeni destekleriz.

benefits.title: Kültürel izin
benefits.description: Bayram ve özel günler için ekstra izin günleri.

benefits.title: Mobilite desteği
benefits.description: Toplu taşıma bileti ya da bisiklet leasing desteği.

benefits.title: Eğitim bütçesi
benefits.description: Konferans, dil kursu ve sertifika programları.

emptyState.title: Şu an açık pozisyon yok
emptyState.description: Yine de bizimle çalışmak istersen, kendini tanıtan bir e-posta gönder. Yeni roller açıldığında ilk seninle iletişime geçeriz.

intro.title: Join the Lemon-Time crew
intro.description: We are strategists, creatives, producers, and community experts committed to culturally intelligent marketing. If you care about diversity, storytelling, and impact, we’d love to hear from you.

values.title: Diversity
values.description: We believe in teams that reflect the communities we serve.

values.title: Ownership
values.description: You will have room to experiment, take responsibility, and shape processes.

values.title: Learning
values.description: Access to mentoring, training budget, and cross-functional knowledge sharing.

benefits.title: Flexible working
benefits.description: Hybrid setup with studio space in Frankfurt am Main.

benefits.title: Cultural leave
benefits.description: Additional days off for major cultural or religious holidays.

benefits.title: Mobility budget
benefits.description: Public transport ticket or bike leasing.

benefits.title: Learning stipend
benefits.description: Yearly allowance for conferences and professional courses.

openings.title: Account Director Ethnomarketing
openings.description: Lead brand partnerships, orchestrate integrated campaigns, and advise clients on growth opportunities within the Turkish diaspora.
responsibilities: Manage key accounts and orchestrate cross-functional teams
Translate business objectives into actionable campaign plans
Steer budget, timing, and quality assurance
Identify upselling opportunities and new business leads
requirements: Fluent in English; German or Turkish a plus
Experience with integrated campaigns (media, digital, events)
benefits: Access to industry events across Europe

emptyState.title: Didn’t find the right role?
emptyState.description: Share your portfolio or CV with us. We’re always open to meeting passionate talent for future opportunities.
